abstract: Panama beats United States, 3-2, with penalty shootout in Gold Cup match for third place.
lead_paragraph: Forced into the third-place game after its surprising loss to Jamaica, the U.S. national team was in no mood for consolation and showed it in a shootout loss to Panama.

headline.main: United States’ Gold Cup Performance Culminates With a Whimper
headline.print_headline: United States’ Gold Cup Performance Culminates With a Whimper

snippet: Forced into the third-place game after its surprising loss to Jamaica, the U.S. national team was in no mood for consolation and showed it in a shootout loss to Panama.
